module.name: Dynamic Routes
module.description: Routes calls based on dynamically calculated information that can be taken from a mysql database or via odbc with any supported database, from asterisk variables, from a url or an agi script. Parameters to the lookups can combine dtmf input, asterisk variables, or values saved from previously executed dynamic routes on the same call.
